lead_paragraph: SANDERS--Reva M.,died February 2. A devoted, fiery, and deeply loved woman. A NYC teacher for 30 years and teacher to her family and friends for a lifetime. Service at Riverside Chapel, Friday, February 5 at 11:15am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SANDERS, REVA M.

snippet: SANDERS--Reva M.,died February 2. A devoted, fiery, and deeply loved woman. A NYC teacher for 30 years and teacher to her family and friends for a lifetime. Service at Riverside Chapel, Friday, February 5 at 11:15am. 1/3
